title: Criminalizes the intentional flight by a motor vehicle operator to avoid apprehension by a police officer
summary: Criminalizes the intentional flight by a motor vehicle operator to intentionally flee and avoid apprehension by a police officer after having been signaled or directed to stop; violation of this provision is a misdemeanor.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to disregarding a lawful order of a police officer to stop a motor vehicle
